Home.heroDescription1: I am a software developer with experience in

Resume.aboutDescription: I am Rahil Kaiser, a dedicated software developer with experience in fullstack development and app development. In my previous roles, I was often praised for my ability to quickly and systematically familiarize myself with complex systems. I am solution-oriented and always ready to contribute my best.
Resume.experienceDescription: Over the past years, I have worked in various roles as a full-stack developer, gaining extensive experience in software development. My tasks included developing web and cloud-based applications, maintaining and improving existing systems, as well as managing security and monitoring systems.
Resume.educationDescription: Solid knowledge in applied computer science, complemented by an in-depth academic education with a focus on computer graphics.
Resume.skillsDescription: Experienced in modern web technologies and frameworks with a strong focus on frontend and full-stack development.

Portfolio.project1Description: QuickEdit offers the ability to efficiently edit images. You can remove the background, eliminate specific elements in the image, improve the resolution, and much more.
Portfolio.project2Description: This application is a Netflix clone developed to deepen and showcase Angular skills. The project uses Angular in combination with TailwindCSS and Bootstrap for styling. The application retrieves video data via the TMDB API.
Portfolio.project3Description: NekoStore is an e-commerce shop that uses Next.js, Tailwind CSS. The integration of Wix Studio Headless CMS enables easy management of products, users, and content. Users can log in, browse, and filter products.

Contact.title: Let's create something great together
Contact.description: I look forward to contributing my strengths to your team. If you're interested in working together, feel free to reach out via the form. I look forward to hearing from you.
